name: NSAnimationContext
desc: An animation context, which contains information about environment and state.

items.name: var completionHandler: (() -> Void)?
items.desc: A completion Block that is called when the animations in the grouping are completed.

items.name: class func runAnimationGroup((NSAnimationContext) -> Void, completionHandler: (() -> Void)?)
items.desc: Allows you to specify a completion block body after the set of animation actions whose completion will trigger the completion block.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration used by animations created as a result of setting new values for an animatable property.

items.name: var timingFunction: CAMediaTimingFunction?
items.desc: The timing function used for all animations within this animation proxy group.

items.name: var allowsImplicitAnimation: Bool
items.desc: Determine if animations are enabled or not for animations that occur as a result of another property change.
